package.name: Not_Translated_Interface_Locale_Options
package.summary: Make Interface locale options not translated in the admin panel.
package.description:
This extension makes Interface locale options not translated in the admin panel.
So all the "Interface Locale:" select options are displayed in English at the bottom of the admin panel page.
It overrides the getLanguageSelect() function in the Mage_Adminhtml_Block_Page_Footer class.
Note: It solves the
Warning: simplexml_load_file() .. out of memory error ... in ... lib/Zend/Locale/Data.php on line 146
problem on Hostgator shared hosting
package.notes: Wrong PHP Version in package dependences corrected.
